    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        public void initialize()
        Description copied from class: GameEngine
        Allows the game to perform any initialization it needs to before starting to run like:

        • Creating instances of GameObject and Tiletypes.
        • Calling contructors/initalization of GameObject instances.
        • Configuring Background sprite, Background color, OnScreenButtons, Tile size and TileMaps.
        • Starting the game.

        Override this method inside your game base class that extends from GameEngine. Call super.initialize() at the very start.

        Overrides:
        initialize in class GameEngine

      • update

        public void update()
        Description copied from class: GameEngine
        Allows the game to run logic such as updating the world, checking for collisions, gathering input, and playing audio.

        Override this method inside your game base class that extends from GameEngine. Every gameloop this method is called once.

        GameObjects that were added to the game (by either addPlayer or addGameObject) should NOT be updated here. Classes that extend from GameObject or MovableGameObject have their own update() that should be overwritten.

        Overrides:
        update in class DebugEngine
        See Also:
        MoveableGameObject, GameObject
